sagex.phoenix.task

Class RetryTaskManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sagex.phoenix.task.RetryTaskManager

  • public class RetryTaskManager
extends java.lang.Object
    TaskManager is used to manager long running tasks that require rety abilities. If you only need to run simple background task that does not require retries, then use the java Timer and TimerTask.

    Subclasses will need implement the createTask() method to create tasks for their particular type.
